function.name: version
function.description: Returns the current version of Xillio Content Tools as a string. If the optional string argument requiredversion is passed, this function asserts it against the current version of the tool, and halts processing if the version is incompatible.

example.description: Note: your version number may differ.
Running the following on Xillio Content Tools version 1.4.1:
while running in version 1.6 it would print:
